text:
Moved another 10k to BofA this am.
Thanks!
P. S. Not trying to fight. But it is an example of where I can forward it to you, but I still can’t say “Hey- this for 10k” because it doesn’t show in the
email. I can come here and tell you that, and be nice or a jerk, or do it there and be nice or a jerk. But here we can’t reference anything else in the email
effectively that’s relevant (ex: links, details, schedule graphics) because it’s not here. It just makes it more difficult. That’s all!
Message 1764 of 4024
Hey- Can I see Adrian soon? Thanks!
Sent:03/01/2024 at 12:32 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 01:14 PM)
Subject:Visitation
Message 1765 of 4024
That email while I shared I am in back to back was unfair.
I plan to submit a temp proposal to my attorney, which include in phase 1, Adrian has time with you but no over nights to build back trust as he ad
requested, then phase 2 the schedule we had prior to the surveillance.
In regards to reunification, I have no idea what you are communicating to potential candidates, but it seems in reading responses perhaps you have
not been forthcoming about your role and harm. It appears you mentioned 5 different therapists and failed interventions. Are they aware of the exact
reasons or perhaps you are pinning on me as you do in these emails and is my fault.
Sent:03/01/2024 at 01:18 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 01:24 PM)
Subject:Re: Visitation
Message 1766 of 4024
I explicitly mentioned that you were busy. And I moved the ball forward in everyone’s best interests. I also said I am responsible for a
disproportionate part of the blame. I hope nothing was a dig, not my intent.
Submit what you like. We went to Dr Brown for a reason twice. If both times you refuse to follow her professional guidance after demanding it as a
condition to not press charges, that’s your decision.
With regard to reunification, only a fool would try and portray himself as the hero and you as the villain going into this. I am asked questions I I
answer them. They evaluate based on that. No one will touch us.
I know you’re very busy today, and I don’t plan on fighting with you no matter what. You don’t need that drama while you’re trying to do your job.
Happy to work with you when you have time. Let me know!
Other:
• What are your expectations wrt the RO? Are you still thinking? Just let me know.
• I’ve been blessed to see AD for 2 weeks. Please see the original question asked.
Sent:03/01/2024 at 01:37 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/01/2024 at 01:37 PM)
Subject:Re: Visitation
